Package org.jgentleframework.configure

Interface Summary
BindingConfig BindingConfig interface provides all methods need to perform binding.
ConfigModule The Interface ConfigModule.
Configurable All classes implement this interface must be abstract classes, calling configurable classes.
ConfigurableImporter The Interface ConfigurableImporter.
CoreBinding Provides some methods in order to configure binding and mapping.
Location The Class Location.
SystemConfig Provides some system methods in order to execute some system configurations including DefinitionPostProcessor, AnnotationBeanProcessor, ...
 

Class Summary
AbstractBindingConfig The Class AbstractBindingConfig.
AbstractConfig The Class AbstractConfig.
AbstractConfigModule The Class AbstractConfigModule.
BindingConfigImpl An implementation of BindingConfig interface.
ConfigurationProxy This proxy class is responsible for configurable object instantiation containing all information of configured data.
REF Provides some static method in order to refer specified instances.
SystemConfigImpl The implemetation of SystemConfig interface.
TemplateClass Template class là một abstract class chứa đựng các thể hiện của các annotation sẽ được generate động khi cấu hình một dynamic defnition nhưng không có thông tin cấu hình cụ thể bằng annotation đi kèm.
 

Exception Summary
AnnotatingRuntimeException The Class AnnotatingRuntimeException.
BindingException The Class BindingException.
